name: ytdl-audio-trimmer
description: YouTube Downloader + Audio Trimmer is a project for educational purpose only. Focused on learning Javascript and Node.js, this project aims to show in a simple way how to automatically download audio from a YouTube URL, convert it to MP3 and cut the audio to a desired track. Use for study purposes only and remember that Copyright is reserved for artists and producers.
